review: I really like the fire tv stick, I was looking for something else to watch all my Amazon prim shows and found it with the fire tv stick, along with other great at apps..
author: tara bath

review: I have found the Fire stick to be way too complicated for me.  Probably just me but in order to watch anything I have to go into the keyboard and type, slow and hard to do, heaven help you if you make a mistake.  I am sorry I bought this and don't recommend it to anyone.  I even spent a long time on the phone with a very nice lady trying to help me.  She helped with some of the issues but not the latest ones.
author: B. Hamilton

review: Ditched those ridiculous cable fees and I have no regrets. This is a great product and with prime membership it has replaced cable for my family.
author: lightdays

review: Makes my tv a smart tv
author: edwin

review: A little more complicated to get started than I thought. Needed to call tech support but now it is working fine. There is access to a lot of apps if you are willing to pay!
author: Bernard Nieters

review: Unable to connect to my TV!
author: Cassielo Pete

review: It's great for entertainment and I cannot wait for them to add HBOGo!
author: Tiffany Dubon

review: Easy to use and a great movie access for our grandchildren.
author: Joy in Jesus
